mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into members (`name`, `password`, nickname, `rank`, phone, create_time, gender, `status`, birthday, personalized_signature, email) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{personalizedSignature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update members set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `rank` = #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, personalized_signature = #{personalizedSignature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, `password`, nickname, `rank`, phone, create_time, gender, `status`, birthday, personalized_signature, email from members where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, `name`, `password`, nickname, `rank`, phone, create_time, gender, `status`, birthday, personalized_signature, email from members
